error.title: Error!

makeWishlistPublic.text: Are you sure? It can enable the person who wishlist is intended for to see it as well.

shareWithTarget.text: Are you sure? This will enable the person who wishlist is for to see the wishlist.

invitationAccepted.title: Invitation accepted
invitationAccepted.text: You are now connected with this person.

removePerson.title: Remove person
removePerson.text: Do you realy want to remove this person from your persons? This will also remove all events in calendar for this person.

deleteComment.title: Delete comment
deleteComment.text: You won't be able to revert this!
